name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering robust applications, specializing in **Java**, **Spring**, **Microservices**, and CI/CD methodologies. Proficient in creating scalable solutions utilizing **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and cloud platforms such as **AWS**. Strong expertise in both SQL and NoSQL databases, ensuring efficient data management. Demonstrated ability in effective **Unit Testing** and meticulous **Documentation** to enhance software quality.
Additionally, I bring hands-on experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, providing a well-rounded approach to full-stack development. I have developed AI/ML-powered platforms employing **FastAPI**, **Django**, and can integrate with modern frontend frameworks like **React** and **Angular**. I thrive in compliance-focused environments, adhering to standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS while fostering team communication and collaboration.
